opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Grimes, Trustees Under the Will of Chaplin v. Navigant Consulting, Inc.

opinion:
536 U.S. 920

GRIMES ET AL., TRUSTEES UNDER THE WILL OF CHAPLIN, ET AL.
v.
NAVIGANT CONSULTING, INC., ET AL.

No. 01-1297.

Supreme Court of the United States.

June 17, 2002.

1

C. A. 7th Cir. Certiorari granted, judgment vacated, and case remanded for further consideration in light of Devlin v. Scardelletti, ante, p. 1. Reported below: 275 F. 3d 616.
